00053 void TSeparatorKit::initClass()

00055         SO_KIT_INIT_CLASS(TSeparatorKit, SoSeparatorKit, "SeparatorKit");

00061 TSeparatorKit::TSeparatorKit()
00062 {
00063     SO_KIT_CONSTRUCTOR(TSeparatorKit);
00064 
00065         SO_KIT_ADD_CATALOG_ABSTRACT_ENTRY(tracker, SoNode, TDefaultTracker, TRUE, this, "", TRUE);
00066         SO_KIT_INIT_INSTANCE();
00067 
00068         SoTransform* transform = new SoTransform;
00069         setPart("transform", transform);
00070 
00071 }

00083 SoNode* TSeparatorKit::getPart( const SbName &partname, SbBool makeifneeded )
00084 {
00085          return SoSeparatorKit::getPart( partname, makeifneeded );

00091 SbBool  TSeparatorKit::setPart(const SbName& partname, SoNode* from )
00092 {
00093     if( partname == "tracker" )
00094     {
00095 
00096         SoTransform* parentTransform = static_cast< SoTransform* > ( getPart("transform", true ) );
00097         if( !parentTransform ) return false;
00098 
00099         if( !from )
00100         {
00101                 parentTransform->translation.disconnect();
00102                 parentTransform->rotation.disconnect();
00103                 parentTransform->scaleFactor.disconnect();
00104                 parentTransform->scaleOrientation.disconnect();
00105                 parentTransform->center.disconnect();
00106         }
00107         else
00108         {
00109                 TTracker* trackerNode = static_cast< TTracker* >( from );
00110                         trackerNode->ConnectParentTranform(parentTransform);
00111                 /*parentTransform->translation.connectFrom( &trackerNode->outputTranslation );
00112                 parentTransform->rotation.connectFrom( &trackerNode->outputRotation );
00113                 parentTransform->scaleFactor.connectFrom( &trackerNode->outputScaleFactor );
00114                 parentTransform->scaleOrientation.connectFrom( &trackerNode->outputScaleOrientation );
00115                 parentTransform->center.connectFrom( &trackerNode->outputCenter );*/
00116         }
00117     }
00118 
00119     return SoSeparatorKit::setPart( partname, from );
00120 }
